2019 is the International Year of the Periodic Table which was revolutionary in its ability to predict characteristics of as-yet-undiscovered elements. @BerkeleyLab discovered 16 elements--some predicted & some artificially created. Learn more #IYPT2019 https://youtu.be/HIS6k1RgYt0

15 years ago the Opportunity Rover landed on Mars. It was designed to last for 3 months. Instead, as a testament to the extraordinary scientists and engineers at @NASA, it operated until June 2018 and mission experts are still trying to reestablish communications. pic.twitter.com/JpXmxxFXrH
